column2: an A.M. Eatery////My friend and I did get a stomach ache after eating
column3: idk what it could have been. I probably wouldn't go back.  I swatted away a fly at my table.  And my Benedict was cold when it arrived
column4: hopefully they didn't have it sitting out uncovered before bringing it out to me. Allowing the fly to do his business on it... that's the only thing I could think of why we got sick after eating here.
